<a id="GLTFTextureSampler"></a>

# GLTFTextureSampler

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents a glTF texture sampler

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Represents a texture sampler as defined by the base glTF spec. Texture samplers in glTF specify how to sample data from the texture's base image, when rendering the texture on an object.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Runtime file loading and saving](../tutorials/io/runtime_file_loading_and_saving.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="GLTFTextureSampler_property_mag_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **mag_filter** = `9729` [ðŸ”—](#GLTFTextureSampler_property_mag_filter)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mag_filter**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_mag_filter**\ (\ )

Texture's magnification filter, used when texture appears larger on screen than the source image.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GLTFTextureSampler_property_min_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **min_filter** = `9987` [ðŸ”—](#GLTFTextureSampler_property_min_filter)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_min_filter**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_min_filter**\ (\ )

Texture's minification filter, used when the texture appears smaller on screen than the source image.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GLTFTextureSampler_property_wrap_s"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **wrap_s** = `10497` [ðŸ”—](#GLTFTextureSampler_property_wrap_s)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_wrap_s**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_wrap_s**\ (\ )

Wrapping mode to use for S-axis (horizontal) texture coordinates.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GLTFTextureSampler_property_wrap_t"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **wrap_t** = `10497` [ðŸ”—](#GLTFTextureSampler_property_wrap_t)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_wrap_t**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_wrap_t**\ (\ )

Wrapping mode to use for T-axis (vertical) texture coordinates.
